summary: Provides an MXNet‑compatible implementation of an attention‑based graph convolution layer that derives edge attention scores from cosine similarity of node features, optionally learns a scaling factor, and propagates node representations using the resulting attention matrix while handling isolated nodes.
business_intent: Enables developers to incorporate attention‑driven message passing in graph neural network models built with MXNet, improving expressive power for tasks such as node classification, link prediction, and graph representation learning.
